name: chatgpt-virtualizer
description: Chrome MV3 Extension with TypeScript and tsup

scripts.postbuild: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Copy-Item 'public\manifest.json' 'dist\' -Force; if (Test-Path 'src\ui\popup.html') { Copy-Item 'src\ui\popup.html' 'dist\' -Force }; if (Test-Path 'src\ui\popup.css') { Copy-Item 'src\ui\popup.css' 'dist\' -Force }; if (Test-Path 'src\content\styles.css') { Copy-Item 'src\content\styles.css' 'dist\' -Force }"
